title: Sion Ultimate turning on a dime?
body: In my ranked game our sion claimed his ult was "bugged" he was able to control it perfectly like a rammus powerball. Was pretty damn op for him to run in circles to charge it up to max damage and just gib ppl. He also would run behind people and hit them in the back. I was wondering how he did it but he wouldnt tell, was he using some sort of exploit or script or is this legit?
